LanguageData.MorrowRim_BonewalkerGraveRevenant_Letter: {0} has become possessed by a wraith, driving it completely mad in the process. It will now seek out living flesh, in an attempt to make itself whole again.\n\nCaution is advised, as the wraith has empowered {0}.
LanguageData.MorrowRim_Bonewalker_NeedResearch: You must research {0} before you can use this ability.
